import{useState}from'react';import Select from"react-select";import{seenOnBway,showTypes,theatres}from"./seenOnBway";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AddAShow(){const[newShow,addNewShow]=useState({id:0,show:"",showType:"",theatre:"",seenOn:"",stars:0});const handleNumber=e=>{addNewShow({...newShow,id:e.target.value});};const handleName=e=>{addNewShow({...newShow,show:e.target.value});};const handleType=e=>{addNewShow({...newShow,showType:e.value});};const handleTheatre=e=>{addNewShow({...newShow,theatre:e.value});};const handleDate=e=>{addNewShow({...newShow,seenOn:e.target.value});};const handleStars=e=>{addNewShow({...newShow,stars:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();const pastShows=[...seenOnBway];pastShows.push(newShow);console.log(newShow);//console.log(pastShows);
};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"NumberField",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Show Number:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"id",value:newShow.id,onChange:handleNumber,placeholder:"1"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"TextField",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Show Name:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"show",value:newShow.show,onChange:handleName,placeholder:"enter show name"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"SelectField",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Show Type:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Select,{source:"showType",options:showTypes,onChange:handleType,defaultValue:showTypes[0]})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"SelectField",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Theatre:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Select,{name:"theatre",options:theatres,onChange:handleTheatre,defaultValue:theatres[0]})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"DateField",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Date Seen:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"datetime-local",format:"MM-DD-YYYY | hh:mm a",name:"seenOn",value:newShow.seenOn,onChange:handleDate})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"RatingField",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Rating:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"range",name:"stars",max:"5",value:newShow.stars,onChange:handleStars})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",value:"submit",children:"Submit"})]});};export default AddAShow;
